resources.string: 衛生福利部疾病管制署
Stay Safe, Keep Your Family Safe

The Taiwan Social Distancing App was developed by the Taiwan AI Labs in cooperation with the Executive Yuan and the Taiwan Centers for Disease Control in order to reduce the likelihood of disease transmission and keep people safe.

Taiwan Social Distancing App use is anonymous - users do not need to register and no user data will be collected. The only form of data transmission involved is the observation of Bluetooth signals between handheld devices to calculate the distance between each user.\n\nUser privacy will be ensured via decentralized storage of anonymous IDs for individual devices; contact data will be compiled by each respective device.

Users who have tested positive can choose to anonymously publish their device\'s anonymous IDs. When users with a positive test publish their results, people who have been in proximity to this device and maintained contact for a certain period of time will receive a notification. This process guarantees the anonymity and personal privacy of those who share their positive test results while contributing to keeping our communities informed and diligent in taking preventative and cautionary measures.
To receive notifications, please free up storage.
Click the button below to enable exposure notification for possible contact with COVID-positive persons.
No contact with registered positive tests
Please continue to maintain social distancing.
You have been in proximity with registered positive tests

string-array.name: risk_detail_risky
string-array.item: Stay Calm: You have been identified as a close contact of a confirmed COVID-19 case, but that does NOT mean you are a confirmed case.\n
Self-Health Management: We advise you to conduct self-health management and be aware of your health conditions.\n
Health Conditions: If you have fever or respiratory symptoms, please contact your local health agency, or dial the toll-free hotline \"1922\" for testing arrangement.

resources.string: Hardware of this device does not support exposure notification.
Exposure notification is not supported for current user profile.
The client is not in approved client list.
Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
Have You Had a Positive Test?
Upload your anonymous IDs to reduce transmission.
Please Enter Start and End Dates

Please enter the verification code provided by the local Department of Health. After submitting, your anonymous IDs will be uploaded. These data will be stored by the Taiwan Centers for Disease Control and will be automatically deleted after 10 days.
No data between start and end dates.
This allows user who is the COVID-19 confirmed case to receive verification code.
Verification code will be sent to you via SMS in 5 minutes, please try again if you do not receive it.
Connect error occurred, please try again later.
Number of request exceeded limit, please try again tomorrow.

New \"1922 SMS\" QR code scanning feature.

string-array.name: feature_barcode_tip
string-array.item: Tip 1 Shortcut: \nLong press the app icon on a Home screen, you will get a shortcut list. Then you can drag the \"1922 SMS\" shortcut to your Home screen.\n
Tip 2 Widget: \nLong press an empty space on a Home screen and tap \"Widgets.\" Then you can find the widget of \"&appname;\" app and drag it to your Home screen.\n
➤ Tip 1 and Tip 2 are both recommended to add this function. Choose the one you prefer :D\n

Tip 3 Quick Settings: \nSwipe down from the top of your screen twice and tap the \"Edit\" button. (Different devices may have different steps.) Then add the \"1922 SMS\" button into the \"Quick Settings.\" For more detailed instruction, please refer to the Android Help Center.\n
➤ It’s slightly slower launching from \"Quick Settings\" than from a shortcut or widget, but it’s convenient to activate the scanning function any time you swipe down your screen.
